name: htm
description: The Tagged Template syntax for Virtual DOM. Only browser-compatible syntax.

scripts.build: npm run -s build:main && npm run -s build:preact && npm run -s build:babel
scripts.build:preact: microbundle src/integrations/preact/index.mjs -o preact/index.js -f es,umd --external preact,htm --no-sourcemap --target web && cp src/integrations/preact/{index.d.ts,package.json} preact/ && npm run -s build:preact:standalone
scripts.test: eslint src/**/*.mjs test && npm run build && jest test
scripts.release: npm run build && git checkout --detach && git add -f babel dist preact && git commit -am "$npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version && git push --tags && git checkout master
